answers.answer: Yes. I was always nervous. Especially when it came time to start chacking my cervix.
Yep this is my second pregnancy in two years and I'm still nervous. About weight gain, about baby size, preeclampsia, high blood pressure etc. It's normal.
I was always excited for mine in the beginning but now I'm starting to get nervous in the end, I think it's just anxiety because I don't want anything to be wrong!
Yes! I'm always super anxious!!! My heart rate shoots through the roof because of it, a good 110-120 everytime!

question: Is it normal to always be nervous for your appointment?
title: appointments
